summary: This ring will make you nigh-invincible. It grants unlimited mana, quick health & stamina regeneration, greatly increased armour rating, the ability to walk on water and the removal of the cooldown on Dragon Shouts.
descriptionHtml: This ring will make you nigh-invincible. It grants unlimited mana, quick health & stamina regeneration, greatly increased armour rating, the ability to walk on water and the removal of the cooldown on Dragon Shouts.
author: CurrGuts
